This site contains stats for the 2022 Mudcats campaign. This is very much a work in progress so feel free to reach out with items you'd like to see incorporated. We are a bit limited by Gamechanger. However, please see the [All Possible Stats](All Possible Stats-gamechanger-stats.html) for a list of all possible stats.
